column1: #text=I like to ride on trains because you can see lots of countryside without having to worry about driving .
#text=One time , when I lived in Alaska , I rode on a train from Fairbanks to Denali park .
#text=Just like with all train rides , I had to buy a ticket first and then I had to stand in line to wait for the train to stop at the station .
#text=Then I climbed onto the train and picked a seat .
#text=The different places you can sit in a train are called cars .
#text=You do n't have assigned seats like on a plane and the seats are wide for more than one person to sit .
#text=So , I picked one in a car in the back and sat right beside the window .
#text=After the train started moving , a train attendant walked through to check our tickets and then I stood up to walk around .
#text=You can walk from car to car on a train and can even go out of the back of the very last car and stand outside , so I did that .
#text=It was very fun to be standing outside while the train was moving and I hung onto the railing to be sure I was safe .
#text=Then I went back inside and went to the dining car where I bought a sandwich and water .
#text=After I got back to my seat , I ate and watched the scenery through the window .
#text=I saw lots of interesting things including a moose and we arrived at Denali right after that .
